response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to you at $1,500,000. I am confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors and aspirations. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you this exceptional opportunity at a price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects my commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while ensuring fair compensation for our valued asset. I look forward to your positive response and the potential for a fruitful partnership.", "product_price": 1200000}
